title: Today: Council to Review MCPS Financial Report, Moving Cash Around and $2 Million for Chromebooks  #found$$$  #notforteachers #slushfund
content: September 28, 2015  Montgomery County Council Education Committee 9:30 AM- Room 3CCR at Montgomery County Council building •MCPS FY15 year-end financial report and categorical transfer     •Update-MCPS Technology Plan
source: Parents' Coalition of Montgomery County, Maryland
